help.addOperation.title: How to add an operation
help.addOperation.description: Adding operations allows you to track your income and expenses.
help.addOperation.steps: Select the operation type: Expense or Income
Select a category from the list
Specify the date and time of the operation
help.addOperation.tips: You can quickly select a category from suggestions
Notes help better understand what the amount was spent on
Operations can be edited and deleted after creation
help.budget.title: How to work with budget
help.budget.description: Budget helps control your expenses and plan finances.
help.budget.steps: On the home page, find the "Monthly Budget" card
Track expense progress in the budget card
help.budget.tips: Budget is set separately for each month
Daily limit is calculated automatically based on remaining days
When budget is exceeded, the card will show a warning
help.analytics.title: How to use analytics
help.analytics.description: Analytics helps visualize your financial data and find patterns.
help.analytics.steps: Select the desired period: Month, Years, or Overall
On the "Month" tab, view expenses by category and by day
On the "Years" tab, analyze income by years and categories
On the "Overall" tab, view overall income statistics
Use charts for visual data analysis
help.analytics.tips: Click on a chart element for more detailed information
On the income by years chart, you can select specific categories
Analytics helps understand where most money is spent
help.categories.title: How to manage categories
help.categories.description: Categories help organize your operations by types of expenses and income.
help.categories.steps: Go to operations section and click "Manage categories"
Click "Add category" to create a new one
Enter category name and select color
To edit, click the edit icon next to the category
To archive, click the archive icon
help.categories.tips: Categories are divided into expenses and income
Archived categories are not deleted but hidden from the list
Categories in use cannot be deleted, only archived
help.export.title: How to export data
help.export.description: Data export allows you to save your financial records for external use.
help.export.steps: Select period: specific month or "All data"
Click "Export JSON" to export in JSON format
Or click "Export CSV" to export in table format
The file will automatically download to your device
help.export.tips: JSON format preserves the full data structure, including categories and budgets
CSV format is convenient for working in Excel or Google Sheets
Export can be used for data backup
help.filters.title: How to filter operations
help.filters.description: Filters help quickly find needed operations from a large list.
help.filters.steps: On the operations page, click the search/filters icon
In the "Search" field, enter text to search by notes or category names
Use "From date" to specify the start date of the period
Use "To date" to specify the end date of the period
Use "Expenses" and "Income" buttons to filter by type
Select categories from the list to filter by categories
help.filters.tips: All filters can be combined for more precise search
Search works on notes and category names
Filters can be reset by clearing search fields and deselecting categories
